dialogue.name: showbackgroundimage
dialogue.string: black

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "Ah, Sayori! Yuri! Natsuki! You're back!"

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "How was your time hanging with Boyfriend and Girlfriend in their hometown?"

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: (Aha, I still can't believe that's their actual names. Even says so on their character files-)

dialogue.name: natsuki
dialogue.string: "I had a screaming competition with a rock star! And I totally beat them too."

dialogue.name: natsuki
dialogue.string: "They're inviting me back next week for a rematch. If I win, I get free tickets to their band's next show!"

dialogue.name: yuri
dialogue.string: "I had a lot of extra money to spend this week, so I ate dinner at a very nice restaurant not too far off from the city."

dialogue.name: yuri
dialogue.string: "While I was there, I had a nice chat with someone who shared a... similar interest in collecting."

dialogue.name: yuri
dialogue.string: "He also seemed very intrigued when I mentioned our two new club members in a conversation. I didn't want to pry, though."

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: (There's a lot of strange, fantastical people out there in the real world, it seems.)

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: (And somewhere out there, my true love... I still have not forgotten about them.)

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: (I'll go back and continue my search soon enough. There's... so much I need to tell them.)

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "Ah- sorry, I got lost in thought. What about you, Sayori? Did you meet any new friends on your trip?"

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "It was amazing! I didn't even know all these places existed!"

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "It's almost as if they popped up out of nowhere, ehehe~"

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "I did meet a new friend, in fact! He's followed me around the whole time we were gone."

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "Eh-? That's... a little odd."

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "-But I'm glad you all found some great new friends!"

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "Mhhmm! He followed me back here too! Wanna meet him? He's so cute!"

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "Oh? S-sure! Bring them in!"

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "Say hi, Zipper!"

dialogue.name: zipper
dialogue.string: "SKREEEEEEEEEEE!!!!"
